evidence.claim: Zephyr AI utilizes AWS for cloud services and data storage capabilities.
The company implements FHIR standards for healthcare data interchange in its solutions.
Zephyr AI supports HL7 messaging protocols essential for EHR integration.
Specific X12 transaction sets are mentioned for billing and claims processing in the healthcare domain.

icp.icp_reason: Zephyr AI leverages X12 for healthcare data integration, aligns with API automation.
